name: Grren Stone
text: Staff was so cold, unfriendly, and rude before. I dreaded coming here. I was even afraid to ask for help. They made you feel that you were bothering them. No one would smile or want to help us. However, now it is a comfortable, open, kind, attentive, lighter, welcoming atmosphere and I'm so happy. Thanks everyone! Yummy food.

name: Nancy Gutierrez
text: I'm giving 3 stars because at this location they didn't put any vegan cheese as I requested. It was all tomatoes sauce with ingredients. Not cool. I usually don't have this type of problems, but today I did. It's all sauce, no cheese.

name: Elbert Lim
text: Staff was very friendly and accommodating. People are now allowed to eat outside. Pizza is delicious!

name: Lennon Rush
text: The spot is fantastic and spacious, the meals was delicious and the rates were very economical. quickly, efficient service and very welcoming staff. Will definitely recommend this restaurant.

name: Painting & Drywall LLC
text: The pizza was cooked perfectly. The brick oven makes a difference. I got the BBQ Pizza and requested the sauce put on before they cook it cause they regularly only drizzle the sauce on the top after its cooked.

name: Johnny Jailface
text: Got delivery. Ate it all. Fast and fresh. Reminded me of European pizza. Dough knots are gift from God herself.

name: Michael Lahey
text: Excellent build-your-own pizza options, including vegan cheese.

name: Gustavo Gonzalez
text: Yes finally it's open. Such a chill place to hangout and enjoy a pizza my way. A beer and a pizza makes a nice combo

text: I don't know what's happening here.   The pizza is still good.  But the floors, tables, front counter and windows were dirty ( this was in between lunch and dinner rush) and the employees seemed depressed.   I don't know if it's the same ‚Ä¶More

text: Came here for the half pizza and small salad lunch special. Employees were funny and helpful, and the portions and quantities are very generous. I will definitely be back again for lunch soon

name: Phillip Tran
text: I like this place. Many to choose from and pizza is not so greasy. I like the fountain drink. The staff is very happy to server that make my family welcome and come back for more. Store is clean and food are well kept.

text: We were in the area so we decided to stop by the glendora location. The staff did not seem fully trained and a bit confused.  They ran out of tomatoes and there drink machines were almost empty. We had to wait 10 mins for them to refill one ‚Ä¶More

text: Fast service you can get what you want on it.Like the crust  thin

name: Mrs. Davis
text: I really enjoyed the pizza the first time I tried it. It was fresh, fast, and affordable. You can order a specialty pizza or build your own. Both times I came, I got the $5 Lunch Hack. It's a half pizza of your choice. You can pick your own ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Roberts
text: Usually fine, but I waited for 20+ minutes only to find out my pizza might have been "handed to someone else". Just got a refund.

name: Jeffry Johnston
text: First time here. Food was delicious. Fresh ingredients. Ready in no time. Big drink selection plus beers on tap. Indoor and outdoor seating. Tables and booths available.

name: Annelise Acosta
text: 3 stars because they serve White Claw, but I got the Alfredo sauce + pesto ... And it messed me up for 3 days. Maybe it was bad.... Idk. My vibe got kind of ruined staring at the workers making my food because they are pretty sweaty. ü§∑

text: Great pizza and always fast service. Been to 3 different Blaze Pizzas, and all have made the pizzas very tasty. Great price for the pizza aswell, reccomend Blaze Pizza and all the others.

name: Michelle Van Tongeren
text: This was my first time eating the cauliflower pizza crust and I really like it

text: Honestly the pizza isnt great. They do have a variety of toppings, but if you need toppings to make your pizza halfway decent, the pizza is terrible.

text: One of new trend of Fast individual oriented pizza where you walk along a line as you pick your toppings and extras.  Options were less than some but quality and taste we're good.  Pretty popular line developed but things moved along pretty fast.

text: I've never ate here but I pick they're food up for customers through postmates , it always smells good and is git and ready to go quickly! I seen that They serve beer too üëç

text: My mom bought pizza from here yesterday. She found metal pieces in both her pizzas! She bit into a metal piece! Not only that but my brothers pizza was super under done and mushy. Never going here again and definitely telling all friends to stay away as well. Don't go here unless you wanna eat metal with your pizza!

name: Armygunsmith E
text: Definitely like the variety of choices available for toppings. My only criticism is when someone orders a half pizza, they shape an entire pie then cut it in half. If the other half doesn't get used right way, it gets thrown out.

name: Connor McFarlane
text: Fresh ingredients, good dough that doesnt sit in your stomach like a rock. Perfect pizza size for a meal. No limit on ingredients. My favourite personal sized pizza place.

name: David Dance
text: Custom pizzas made to order, kind of like subway.  One of the best pizzas I've ever had too. For pizza it was a little more expensive than I'm used to, but it's not much more than any typical fast food order so it's not bad if you look at it that way and the quality you get.

Arrived 40 minutes before closing. Four people standing around and I had to ask if they were still open to get attention.
Bomb pizza, bummer closing shift employees.

text: This place is pretty dam good. They have gluten free crusts and for those of you that don't do well with dairy they offer goats cheese and vegan options. Just wish they had organic options.
